title: Amazon Brand - Presto! Flex-a-Size Paper Towels, 158 Sheet Huge Roll, 12 Rolls (2 Packs of 6), Equivalent to 38 Regular Rolls, White
descriptions:
Title: Amazon Brand – Presto! Flex-a-Size Paper Towels, Huge Rolls, 12 Count (158 Sheets/Roll), 2-Ply, White

Key Features:
- 12 Huge Rolls: Two packs of 6 rolls each for easy storage and replenishment.
- High Sheet Count: 158 sheets per roll to tackle more messes with fewer roll changes.
- 2-Ply Strength: Durable, dependable, and designed for everyday cleaning.
- Flex-a-Size Sheets: Tear off just the right amount—use less and reduce waste.
- Superior Absorbency: Up to 75% more absorbent versus the leading 1‑ply brand.
- Big Value: 12 Huge Rolls ≈ 38 regular rolls (based on 49 sheets per regular roll).
- Bright White: Clean, classic look for any kitchen or workspace.
- Brand You Know: From Presto!, an Amazon Brand; compare to Bounty Paper Towels.

Product Overview:
Presto! Flex-a-Size Paper Towels deliver powerful, customizable cleaning in every sheet. Each Huge Roll packs 158 strong, 2‑ply sheets designed to absorb quickly and hold up to tough tasks. With Flex-a-Size perforations, you can choose the exact sheet size you need—small for quick wipe-ups or larger for bigger messes—helping you stretch every roll and minimize waste. These white paper towels are up to 75% more absorbent than the leading 1‑ply brand, making spills, splatters, and daily cleanups faster and easier. With 12 Huge Rolls equivalent to 38 regular rolls, you get long-lasting value and fewer trips to restock.

What’s Included:
- 12 Huge Rolls (158 sheets per roll), packaged as 2 packs of 6 rolls.

Specifications:
- Ply: 2‑ply
- Color: White
- Sheets per Roll: 158
- Equivalent Regular Rolls: 38 (based on 49 sheets per regular roll)
- Flex-a-Size: Yes
- Brand: Presto! (Amazon Brand)
- Comparison Brand: Bounty Paper Towels

Ideal For:
- Kitchens, bathrooms, break rooms, and craft areas
- Everyday cleaning, spill control, and polishing
- Households and offices seeking strong, absorbent, and versatile paper towels.

Satisfaction Promise:
Presto! paper towels are backed by Amazon’s commitment to quality. If you’re not satisfied, we’ll make it right.
